Topic.Title: Not sure what to make a game about!? Any ideas?

Posts.EditableText: So basically I enjoy making text based games but struggle to come up with a story line for just myself to enjoy but think others would not play (no Idea what people might want to play), so I would love it if people could give me some ideas as for a game to make, I fancy doing a murder mystery or a sleuth but am struggling to come up with a good, in-depth plot! Any help would be so gratefully excepted! If you have no idea but are working on something and could do with an extra pair of hands just let me know! Thanks!
